A

areAllSelected() - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Checks whether all managed entity types are currently selected.

D

deselectAll() - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Deselects all managed entity types.

E

entitytype - package entitytype
 
EntityTypeSelectionFX - Class in entitytype
JavaFX-aware data structure for managing the selection state of a set of JPA entity types, including configuration for prompt generation and string representation.
EntityTypeSelectionFX(Set<EntityType<?>>) - Constructor for class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Creates a new selection object with all provided entity types initially selected, and sets up observable properties for use in JavaFX user interfaces.

G

getBooleanPropertyForEntityType(EntityType<?>) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Returns the BooleanProperty associated with the given entity type, allowing selection state to be observed or modified in JavaFX.
getEntityTypes() - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Returns all JPA entity types managed by this selection object, regardless of their selection state.
getFullPrompt(String) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Assembles the full prompt for SQL query generation by combining the configured prefix, the user-defined prompt, the postfix, the SQL dialect, the domain string, and the database string.
getSelectedEntityTypes() - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Returns the set of entity types that are currently selected.

I

isEntityTypeSelected(EntityType<?>) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Checks whether the given JPA entity type is currently selected.

S

selectAll() - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Selects all managed entity types.
setDatabaseStringGenerator(DatabaseStringGenerator) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Sets the DatabaseStringGenerator to use for generating the database string representation.
setDomainStringGenerator(DomainStringGenerator) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Sets the DomainStringGenerator to use for generating the domain string representation.
setEntityTypeSelected(EntityType<?>, boolean) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Sets the selection state of the given JPA entity type.
setPromptPrePostfix(String, String) - Method in class entitytype.EntityTypeSelectionFX
Sets the prefix and postfix used for assembling prompts in SQL query generation.
